content: See No Evil is obtained upon defeating any Overseeing Monk enemy in New Thunderclap Temple in Chapter 3 - The New West. Simply farm the enemy until it drops.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'See_No_Evil.md', within the main section titled 'See No Evil'.
The content is as follows:
See No Evil is obtained upon defeating any Overseeing Monk enemy in New Thunderclap Temple in Chapter 3 - The New West. Simply farm the enemy until it drops.
